content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an AI response to browse the website https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/ for the distance and elevation gain of the Brno Reservoir Trail, but the text did not provide that information. The website did provide information on running routes in the area, offering approximately 8 km of decent running with rolling hills, but no loop trail around the entire reservoir. The top end of the reservoir around U Sirky beach is a good area to start, and there is bus access available. Additionally, I received an AI response to Google the best route, which returned multiple links.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "brno reservoir trail distance and elevation gain"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada", "https://www.outdooractive.com/mobile/en/route/hiking-route/czech-republic/brno-reservoir/29020361/", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno/trail-running", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brno", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno/forest", "https://www.sportdistancecalculator.com/index.php?id=15082", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "https://www.gotobrno.cz/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/this-is-brno-and-its-surroundings-by-bike.pdf"]', type='action_result')]
"""
